column5: Wondering how the fishing is around the ear falls area? Any information would be greatly appreciated

We were up for the opener and 1st day was good then came a day of steady rain and wind and we stayed in no fishing. Next day 3 inches of snow we went out after snow and caught a few to eat. After that typical post cold front conditions. I suspect by now things have stabilized

I have a cabin up there and I think the fishing is fantastic many lakes to choose from and a variety of lakes you can drag a boat into. Of course you have Lac Suel out your back door. As for the current fishing it is really picking up with the weather and the hot bite is on according to my resident friend. tight lines no net
Excellent! Thanks. I'm heading to pakwash on June 6, hoping for a hot bite
Which lodge are you headed to?
